name: AON
description:
AON is a game I helped create for Ludum-Dare 35.  The original team for the project was:

Programming:

Anthony Mineo

Alex Santiago

Jasper Zaporteza

Graphic Design:

Zachary Millette

I decided to visit the game again and see what I could do in recreating it having acquired more experience in making video games.  I am very satisfied with the results and hope you enjoy playing the game as much as I enjoyed making it.

The original game can be found here:

https://flyingantman.itch.io/aon
